summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FP4 Metrics Aggregator for SPX Forward Performance. All backend endpoints working correctly with ~60% hit rate from 58 outcomes. Frontend /fractal/spx page accessible and displaying data.

minor_issues.issue: Requires empty JSON body {} to avoid Fastify content-type error
minor_issues.impact: Fixed in test - not a functional issue

design_issues.issue: Page load timeout during networkidle wait, but page renders correctly

passed_tests: POST /api/forward/admin/metrics/rebuild?asset=SPX - rebuilds metrics from 66 signals and 58 outcomes
GET /api/forward/metrics/summary?asset=SPX - returns aggregated metrics with 60% hit rate
GET /api/fractal/spx/forward/summary?horizon=30d - horizon filtering (58.33% hit rate for 30d)
Upsert logic - repeated rebuilds don't create duplicates
Error handling for invalid assets returns proper 400 responses
Frontend /fractal/spx page loads and displays SPX fractal analysis data
success_percentage: backend: 100% (8/8 tests passed), frontend: 95% (loads with minor timeout)
